execution_plan.description: Retrieve all US customers and their state-level location (stored in the 'county' column) to map customers to US states.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, county FROM customers WHERE country IN ('US', 'USA', 'United States');

execution_plan.description: Get the number of orders per customer, restricted to customers found in step 1 (US customers).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id) GROUP BY customer_id;
